fmiModelDescription.description: Complete drum boiler model, including evaporator and supplementary components

ScalarVariable.name: SteamValve.V_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Volume flow rate at inflowing port (positive when flow from port_a to port_b)

ScalarVariable.name: SteamValve.dp
ScalarVariable.description: Pressure difference between port_a and port_b (= port_a.p - port_b.p)

ScalarVariable.name: SteamValve.port_a_T
ScalarVariable.description: Temperature close to port_a, if show_T = true

ScalarVariable.name: SteamValve.port_b_T
ScalarVariable.description: Temperature close to port_b, if show_T = true

ScalarVariable.name: evaporator.h_S
ScalarVariable.description: Steam enthalpy (specific enthalpy close to steam port when mass flows in to the boiler)

ScalarVariable.name: pressure.port.h_outflow
ScalarVariable.description: Specific thermodynamic enthalpy close to the connection point if m_flow < 0

ScalarVariable.name: pressure.port.m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Mass flow rate from the connection point into the component

ScalarVariable.name: pump.medium.MM
ScalarVariable.description: Molar mass (of mixture or single fluid)

ScalarVariable.name: sink.medium.MM
ScalarVariable.description: Molar mass (of mixture or single fluid)

ScalarVariable.name: temperature.port.h_outflow
ScalarVariable.description: Specific thermodynamic enthalpy close to the connection point if m_flow < 0

ScalarVariable.name: temperature.port.m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Mass flow rate from the connection point into the component

ScalarVariable.name: MW2W.k
ScalarVariable.description: Gain value multiplied with input signal

ScalarVariable.name: Pa2bar.k
ScalarVariable.description: Gain value multiplied with input signal

ScalarVariable.name: SteamValve.dp_nominal
ScalarVariable.description: Nominal pressure drop at full opening

ScalarVariable.name: SteamValve.dp_start
ScalarVariable.description: Guess value of dp = port_a.p - port_b.p

ScalarVariable.name: SteamValve.m_flow_nominal
ScalarVariable.description: Nominal mass flowrate at full opening

ScalarVariable.name: SteamValve.m_flow_small
ScalarVariable.description: Small mass flow rate for regularization of zero flow

ScalarVariable.name: SteamValve.port_b.p
ScalarVariable.description: Thermodynamic pressure in the connection point

ScalarVariable.name: Y_Valve_Tab.shiftTime
ScalarVariable.description: Shift time of first table column

ScalarVariable.name: Y_Valve_Tab.startTime
ScalarVariable.description: Output y = offset for time < startTime

ScalarVariable.name: Y_Valve_Tab.table[1,1]
ScalarVariable.description: Table matrix (time = first column; e.g., table=[0, 0; 1, 1; 2, 4])

ScalarVariable.name: Y_Valve_Tab.table[1,2]
ScalarVariable.description: Table matrix (time = first column; e.g., table=[0, 0; 1, 1; 2, 4])

ScalarVariable.name: Y_Valve_Tab.table[2,1]
ScalarVariable.description: Table matrix (time = first column; e.g., table=[0, 0; 1, 1; 2, 4])

ScalarVariable.name: Y_Valve_Tab.table[2,2]
ScalarVariable.description: Table matrix (time = first column; e.g., table=[0, 0; 1, 1; 2, 4])

ScalarVariable.name: Y_Valve_Tab.table[3,1]
ScalarVariable.description: Table matrix (time = first column; e.g., table=[0, 0; 1, 1; 2, 4])

ScalarVariable.name: Y_Valve_Tab.table[3,2]
ScalarVariable.description: Table matrix (time = first column; e.g., table=[0, 0; 1, 1; 2, 4])

ScalarVariable.name: Y_Valve_Tab.timeScale
ScalarVariable.description: Time scale of first table column

ScalarVariable.name: controller.x_start
ScalarVariable.description: Initial or guess value of state

ScalarVariable.name: evaporator.V_l_start
ScalarVariable.description: Start value of liquid volumeStart value of volume

ScalarVariable.name: evaporator.cp_D
ScalarVariable.description: Specific heat capacity of drum metal

ScalarVariable.name: evaporator.h_W
ScalarVariable.description: Feed water enthalpy (specific enthalpy close to feedwater port when mass flows in to the boiler)

ScalarVariable.name: furnace.alpha
ScalarVariable.description: Temperature coefficient of heat flow rate

ScalarVariable.name: massFlowRate.m_flow_small
ScalarVariable.description: Regularization for bi-directional flow in the region |m_flow| < m_flow_small (m_flow_small > 0 required)

ScalarVariable.name: pump.m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Fixed mass flow rate going out of the fluid port

ScalarVariable.name: pump.ports[1].h_outflow
ScalarVariable.description: Specific thermodynamic enthalpy close to the connection point if m_flow < 0

ScalarVariable.name: q_F_Tab.shiftTime
ScalarVariable.description: Shift time of first table column

ScalarVariable.name: q_F_Tab.startTime
ScalarVariable.description: Output y = offset for time < startTime

ScalarVariable.name: q_F_Tab.table[1,1]
ScalarVariable.description: Table matrix (time = first column; e.g., table=[0, 0; 1, 1; 2, 4])

ScalarVariable.name: q_F_Tab.table[1,2]
ScalarVariable.description: Table matrix (time = first column; e.g., table=[0, 0; 1, 1; 2, 4])

ScalarVariable.name: q_F_Tab.table[2,1]
ScalarVariable.description: Table matrix (time = first column; e.g., table=[0, 0; 1, 1; 2, 4])

ScalarVariable.name: q_F_Tab.table[2,2]
ScalarVariable.description: Table matrix (time = first column; e.g., table=[0, 0; 1, 1; 2, 4])

ScalarVariable.name: q_F_Tab.table[3,1]
ScalarVariable.description: Table matrix (time = first column; e.g., table=[0, 0; 1, 1; 2, 4])

ScalarVariable.name: q_F_Tab.table[3,2]
ScalarVariable.description: Table matrix (time = first column; e.g., table=[0, 0; 1, 1; 2, 4])

ScalarVariable.name: q_F_Tab.timeScale
ScalarVariable.description: Time scale of first table column

ScalarVariable.name: sink.ports[1].p
ScalarVariable.description: Thermodynamic pressure in the connection point

ScalarVariable.name: system.dp_small
ScalarVariable.description: Default small pressure drop for regularization of laminar and zero flow

ScalarVariable.name: system.eps_m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Regularization of zero flow for |m_flow| < eps_m_flow*m_flow_nominal

ScalarVariable.name: system.m_flow_small
ScalarVariable.description: Default small mass flow rate for regularization of laminar and zero flow

ScalarVariable.name: system.m_flow_start
ScalarVariable.description: Default start value for mass flow rates

ScalarVariable.name: SteamValve.m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Mass flow rate in design flow direction

ScalarVariable.name: SteamValve.port_a.h_outflow
ScalarVariable.description: Specific thermodynamic enthalpy close to the connection point if m_flow < 0

ScalarVariable.name: SteamValve.port_a.m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Mass flow rate from the connection point into the component

ScalarVariable.name: SteamValve.port_a.p
ScalarVariable.description: Thermodynamic pressure in the connection point

ScalarVariable.name: SteamValve.port_b.h_outflow
ScalarVariable.description: Specific thermodynamic enthalpy close to the connection point if m_flow < 0

ScalarVariable.name: SteamValve.port_b.m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Mass flow rate from the connection point into the component

ScalarVariable.name: evaporator.heatPort.Q_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Heat flow rate (positive if flowing from outside into the component)

ScalarVariable.name: evaporator.port_a.h_outflow
ScalarVariable.description: Specific thermodynamic enthalpy close to the connection point if m_flow < 0

ScalarVariable.name: evaporator.port_a.m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Mass flow rate from the connection point into the component

ScalarVariable.name: evaporator.port_a.p
ScalarVariable.description: Thermodynamic pressure in the connection point

ScalarVariable.name: evaporator.port_b.h_outflow
ScalarVariable.description: Specific thermodynamic enthalpy close to the connection point if m_flow < 0

ScalarVariable.name: evaporator.port_b.m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Mass flow rate from the connection point into the component

ScalarVariable.name: evaporator.port_b.p
ScalarVariable.description: Thermodynamic pressure in the connection point

ScalarVariable.name: furnace.port.Q_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Heat flow rate (positive if flowing from outside into the component)

ScalarVariable.name: massFlowRate.m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Mass flow rate from port_a to port_b

ScalarVariable.name: massFlowRate.port_a.h_outflow
ScalarVariable.description: Specific thermodynamic enthalpy close to the connection point if m_flow < 0

ScalarVariable.name: massFlowRate.port_a.m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Mass flow rate from the connection point into the component

ScalarVariable.name: massFlowRate.port_a.p
ScalarVariable.description: Thermodynamic pressure in the connection point

ScalarVariable.name: massFlowRate.port_b.h_outflow
ScalarVariable.description: Specific thermodynamic enthalpy close to the connection point if m_flow < 0

ScalarVariable.name: massFlowRate.port_b.m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Mass flow rate from the connection point into the component

ScalarVariable.name: massFlowRate.port_b.p
ScalarVariable.description: Thermodynamic pressure in the connection point

ScalarVariable.name: pressure.port.p
ScalarVariable.description: Thermodynamic pressure in the connection point

ScalarVariable.name: pump.ports[1].m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Mass flow rate from the connection point into the component

ScalarVariable.name: pump.ports[1].p
ScalarVariable.description: Thermodynamic pressure in the connection point

ScalarVariable.name: sink.ports[1].h_outflow
ScalarVariable.description: Specific thermodynamic enthalpy close to the connection point if m_flow < 0

ScalarVariable.name: sink.ports[1].m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Mass flow rate from the connection point into the component

ScalarVariable.name: temperature.port.p
ScalarVariable.description: Thermodynamic pressure in the connection point

ScalarVariable.name: pump.medium.phase
ScalarVariable.description: 2 for two-phase, 1 for one-phase, 0 if not known

ScalarVariable.name: sink.medium.phase
ScalarVariable.description: 2 for two-phase, 1 for one-phase, 0 if not known

ScalarVariable.name: controller.initType
ScalarVariable.description: Type of initialization (1: no init, 2: steady state, 3: initial state, 4: initial output)

ScalarVariable.name: system.momentumDynamics
ScalarVariable.description: Default formulation of momentum balances, if options available

ScalarVariable.name: system.traceDynamics
ScalarVariable.description: Default formulation of trace substance balances

ScalarVariable.name: pump.medium.state.phase
ScalarVariable.description: Phase of the fluid: 1 for 1-phase, 2 for two-phase, 0 for not known, e.g., interactive use

ScalarVariable.name: sink.medium.state.phase
ScalarVariable.description: Phase of the fluid: 1 for 1-phase, 2 for two-phase, 0 for not known, e.g., interactive use

ScalarVariable.name: SteamValve.allowFlowReversal
ScalarVariable.description: = true to allow flow reversal, false restricts to design direction (port_a -> port_b)

ScalarVariable.name: SteamValve.show_T
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if temperatures at port_a and port_b are computed

ScalarVariable.name: SteamValve.show_V_flow
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if volume flow rate at inflowing port is computed

ScalarVariable.name: evaporator.allowFlowReversal
ScalarVariable.description: = true to allow flow reversal, false restricts to design direction (port_a -> port_b)

ScalarVariable.name: limiter.strict
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if strict limits with noEvent(..)

ScalarVariable.name: massFlowRate.allowFlowReversal
ScalarVariable.description: = true to allow flow reversal, false restricts to design direction (port_a -> port_b)

ScalarVariable.name: pump.medium.preferredMediumStates
ScalarVariable.description: = true if StateSelect.prefer shall be used for the independent property variables of the medium

ScalarVariable.name: pump.medium.standardOrderComponents
ScalarVariable.description: If true, and reducedX = true, the last element of X will be computed from the other ones

ScalarVariable.name: pump.use_C_in
ScalarVariable.description: Get the trace substances from the input connector

ScalarVariable.name: pump.use_X_in
ScalarVariable.description: Get the composition from the input connector

ScalarVariable.name: pump.use_h_in
ScalarVariable.description: Get the specific enthalpy from the input connector

ScalarVariable.name: pump.use_m_flow_in
ScalarVariable.description: Get the mass flow rate from the input connector

ScalarVariable.name: sink.medium.preferredMediumStates
ScalarVariable.description: = true if StateSelect.prefer shall be used for the independent property variables of the medium

ScalarVariable.name: sink.medium.standardOrderComponents
ScalarVariable.description: If true, and reducedX = true, the last element of X will be computed from the other ones

ScalarVariable.name: system.allowFlowReversal
ScalarVariable.description: = false to restrict to design flow direction (port_a -> port_b)

ScalarVariable.name: system.use_eps_Re
ScalarVariable.description: = true to determine turbulent region automatically using Reynolds number

ScalarVariable.name: use_inputs
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if external inputs are used, otherwise use test data contained internally
